title: Cluster resource usage check issue
content:
As part of the suite upgrade precheck, the cluster resource usage check ensures that your system has no stability issues. If the CPU or memory usage on a worker node in your k8s system reaches 80%, the system may have stability issues. The precheck step therefore returns a warning or error depending on the severity level:

  • Warning: if the usage is between 80% and 90% (inclusive)
  • Error: if the usage is greater than 90%

Cause

The resource usage of the worker nodes is out of balance or you need more worker node resources. 

Solution

You may fix this issue as follows：

  1. Check the resource availability of all worker nodes, and balance the resource usage of the worker nodes as needed.
  2. If resource usage balancing still doesn't work, add an additional temporary worker node. You may delete this node after the upgrade process is complete.
